title: AWS re:Invent 2025-AWS Local Zones- Sophos’ new edge in the global race against cyber-attacks-HMC215
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-AWS Local Zones- Sophos在全球网络攻击竞赛中的新优势-HMC215
abstract: Discover how AWS Hybrid and Edge solutions transform how organizations deliver low-latency applications at the edge. Learn how AWS Local Zones extends AWS Regions and services closer to population centers, fitting use cases from media streaming to real-time gaming and financial trading. Hear from Sophos on how they revolutionized their global threat intelligence service using AWS Local Zones, achieving 69% latency reduction in Germany and handling 1,242% traffic surges during disasters. You'll gain practical insights about deploying multi-tier architecture for global scale. Whether optimizing application performance or exploring edge computing solutions, this session equips you with strategies to enhance end-user experience using AWS Local Zones.
abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 混合云和边缘解决方案如何改变组织在边缘提供低延迟应用程序的方式。了解 AWS Local Zones 如何扩展 AWS 区域和服务，使其更接近人口中心，适用于从媒体流到实时游戏和金融交易等各种使用场景。听取 Sophos 如何使用 AWS Local Zones 彻底改变其全球威胁情报服务，在德国实现 69% 的延迟降低，并在灾难期间处理 1,242% 的流量激增。您将获得有关为全球规模部署多层架构的实用见解。无论是优化应用程序性能还是探索边缘计算解决方案，本次会议都将为您提供使用 AWS Local Zones 增强最终用户体验的策略。
